titleStmt.title: A Christian caueat for al estates. Or A sermon, preached by that religious seruant of God, Master George Hockin, Bachelor of Diuinitie, Fellow of Excester Colledge, and preacher to the towne of Totnes in Deuon
titleStmt.author: Hockin, George, b. 1569 or 70.
I. C., fl. 1622.

notesStmt.note: The editor's dedication is signed: I.C.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
